1.text: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.

2.text: But his delight is in the law of the Lord; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.

3.text: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.

1.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

2.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

3.text: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.

1.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

2.text: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
